import React, { Component } from "react"; import Footer from "../layout/Footer"; import Header from "../layout/Header"; import Sidebar from "../layout/Sidebar"; // const axios = require("axios").default; class ProjectPlan extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { singleFields: { centre_name: "", project_name: "", team_head: "", project_code: "", project_brief: "", work_order: "", funding_ministry: "", nodal_officer: "", contact_no: "", allocated_budget: "", start_date: "", end_date: "", overall_progress: "", }, team_strength: [ { team: "", position: "", experience: "", qualification: "", salary_slab: "", }, ], finances: [ { year: "", budget_head: "", allocated_fund: "", milestone: "", }, ], project_activities: [ { type: "", start_date: "", end_date: "", duration: "", activities: "", remarks: "", }, ], other_activities: [ { other_activity: "", other_date: "", }, ], }; } // SET MULTIPLE ROW render() { return ( <>
{/* Content Header (Page header) */}

Project Form-II

Team Strength

Team Strength Position Experience Qualification Salary Slab Action
this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"teamStrength")} value={item.team} /> this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"teamStrength") } value={item.position} /> this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"teamStrength") } value={item.experience} /> this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"teamStrength") } value={item.qualification} /> this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"teamStrength") } value={item.salary_slab} />

Year Budget Head Allocated Fund Milestone Action
this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"finances") } value={item.year} /> this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"finances") } value={item.allocated_fund} /> this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"finances") } value={item.milestone} />

Project Activities

Type Start Date End Date Duration in days Activities Remarks Action
this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"project_activities") } value={item.start_date} /> this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"project_activities") } value={item.end_date} /> this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"project_activities") } value={item.duration} />

this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"other_activities") } value={item.other_activity} /> this.handleChangeMul(idx,evnt,"other_activities") } value={item.other_date} />
